title: Optimize SAG Mill Throughput
description: A control room operator for a processing plant adjusts the operation of a SAG mill to maximize throughput while avoiding overload.

tasks.description: Review the real-time operating parameters of the SAG mill, including power draw, bearing pressure, and feed rate.
tasks.expected_outcome: The operator has a clear view of the mill's current performance.

tasks.description: Notice that the power draw is below the optimal target, indicating the mill can take more feed.
tasks.expected_outcome: The operator correctly identifies an opportunity to increase throughput.

tasks.description: Slightly increase the speed of the conveyor belt feeding ore into the mill to increase the feed rate.
tasks.expected_outcome: The feed rate is increased, and the mill's power draw moves closer to the optimal target, increasing throughput.
